topItems.title: Year-to-date filtering weekdays in DAX

value.title: Drilling into drillthrough in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can use the drillthrough feature within Power BI Desktop. He also looks at how you can drill to multiple fields at the same time. The back image can also be changed and Patrick shows you how to do it!  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com --

value.title: Exploring the Power Automate Visual in Power BI | Sending emails
value.excerpt: Using Power Automate? Using Power BI? Why not put the two together for some interesting scenarios. Patrick uses the Power Automate visual, in a Power BI report, to send emails out. value.title: Clean, transform, and load data in Power BI

value.title: Get data with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: How can you find, collect, and clean data from different sources? Power BI is a tool for making sense of your data. You will learn tricks to make data-gathering easier.

value.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

value.title: 20 tricks to finally master the Matrix visualization in Power BI!!
value.excerpt: The matrix visualization has over 100 configuration options, and some of the most basic functionality, like hiding subtotals is not so easy to discover.  In today's video, I will show you 20 things you can do on the matrix that will take that visualization to the next level.  Did I miss any? Let me know

value.title: Introduction to creating measures using DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data Analysis Expressionsâ€¯(DAX) is a programming language that is used throughout Microsoft Power BI for creating calculated columns, measures, and custom tables. It is a collection of functions, operators, and constants that can be used in a formula, or expression, to calculate and return one or more values. You can use DAX to solve a number of calculations and data analysis problems, which can help you create new information from data that is already in your model.

value.title: Get data in Power BI
value.excerpt: You will learn how to retrieve data from a wide variety of data sources, including Microsoft Excel, relational databases, and NoSQL data stores. You will also learn how to improve performance while retrieving data.

value.title: Get Power BI Sample Datasets with Python
